templates.text: The order is delayed by the restaurant as the food is not prepared yet. However, the delivery partner is waiting at the restaurant for the order.
The order was delayed by the restaurant. However, the delivery partner has just received the order, and is now on the way to deliver it to the customer's location.
The order is delayed due to grouped orders. However, the delivery partner is on the way to deliver the order to the customer's location.
The order is delayed as the delivery partner has not yet been assigned. Delivery partners are completing another order. The order will be delivered soon.
The order is on time. As per tracking, a delivery partner has not been assigned yet. The order will be delivered soon.

notes.title: Welcome Note
notes.content:
This is your personal notes section!
Create categories and notes for your reference.
